org.springframework.cache.interceptor

类 CacheOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cache.interceptor.CacheOperation
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    BasicOperation
    直接已知子类:
    CacheableOperation, CacheEvictOperation, CachePutOperation

    public abstract class CacheOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements BasicOperation
    Base class for cache operations.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.1
    作者:
    Costin Leau, Stephane Nicoll, Marcin Kamionowski

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  CacheOperation.Builder
      Base class for builders that can be used to create a CacheOperation.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明

      Create a new CacheOperation instance from the given builder.

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Return an identifying description for this cache operation.

        Returned value is produced by calling CacheOperation.Builder.getOperationDescription() during object construction. This method is used in hashCode() and equals(java.lang.Object).

        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        另请参阅:
        CacheOperation.Builder.getOperationDescription()
